THE HONEYWELL AVIONICS PROTECTION PLAN FOR PC-12
Minimize unexpected travel delays and protect your Pilatus PC-12 with Honeywell’s Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) and Mechanical Protection Plan (MPP). Protect more than $680,000 worth of Honeywell avionics and environmental and cabin control systems on your aircraft and receive the peace of mind that more than 3,800 operators are getting today.
Experience the difference with HAPP and MPP with flexible and fixed-rate plans, including a 5-year fixed rate, customized to fit your needs and budget. Plus, HAPP and MPP customers never have to worry about missing a flight with worldwide coverage and an extensive depot of parts updated with the latest reliability modifications while in the repair cycle.
Get HAPP and MPP today and receive:
- Free exchange units for customers if the part has failed - Reduced overall maintenance costs - 24/7 emergency support from Honeywell’s Aircraft on Ground (AOG) service - Access to Honeywell’s global network of authorized service center
Protect your aircraft today with Tempus Jets and Honeywell!
